title: Giving Up Is The Stupid Part
description:
In response to Dr. Laura's question to men about whether they are idiots to get married, Jared says he is grateful for his 22-year marriage and believes he and his wife have both sacrificed to create the good life they share. - Dr. Laura: “A perfect marriage is two imperfect people who refuse to give up on each other.”

What has marriage taught you? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
